reference.shortdesc: The toc element either references a topic that contains a table of contents for the book, or it indicates to a processor that a table of contents should be generated at this location in the book.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: When the href attribute is not specified, a processor might generate a table of contents at the specified location in the map. If the href attribute is specified, the referenced topic or map contains a manually created table of contents.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The toc element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.
